attributes.additional_details:
We believe that the current system of incarceration is ineffective and the re offending rates are too high. We wish to promote

- Productivity ( Working, building etc.)
- Rehabilitation (turning prison members into working members of society after release.)

We can do this in a number of ways such as labour and education for prisoners, particularly first time offenders. Needless to say the current system of prison is an ineffectual form of rehabilitation.
